attributes.action: Stop Banks that take tax payer money from refusing to pass on interest rate cuts
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With more banks taking tax payers money to prop up their business's, with tax payer taking the risk by investing in there business and safe guarding 1000's of jobs. They should pass on bank of England interest rates cuts and should not be allowed to increase there interest rates to off set any bank of England rate cut. This is just another case of the British public being ripped of by greedy companies i.e. petroleum, utilities companies to mention a few. Make a stand lets say enough is enough.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
